Class HilbertSpacesCategory

java.lang.Object
org.jscience.mathematics.algebra.categories.HilbertSpacesCategory
All Implemented Interfaces:
Category<HilbertSpace<?,?>, Matrix<?>>
public class HilbertSpacesCategory extends Object implements Category<HilbertSpace<?,?>, Matrix<?>>
Represents the Category of Hilbert Spaces (Hilb).

Objects are Hilbert spaces. Morphisms are bounded linear operators (represented here as Matrices for finite dim).

Since:
1.0
Author:
Silvere Martin-Michiellot, Gemini AI (Google DeepMind)
